item.title: About me
item.description: I'm a developer studying Systems Design Engineering at the University of Waterloo. My speciality is in front-end design and development, where I enjoy creating robust web solutions with a focus on clean design and user usability. In my free time, my interests extend beyond the web to drawing, music, cooking, and live-streaming. Resume |||||||||| Skills Web Design and Development Scripting Branding and Logo Design Photoshop Video Editing 3D Modelling (Solidworks CAD) 3D Animation (MMD) Music Transcription Microsoft Excel |||||||||| Languages and Frameworks HTML / CSS / Javascript (jQuery) Python C++ Java PHP Processing Node.
